column1: Well, look who was playing Tennis in Africa this afternoon? Bill decided to join Roger, Rafa, and Trevor Noah for a Charity hit in Cape Town. Glad for the kids in Southern Africa who will benefit from the $3.5M raised today. Better than patenting a Corona Virus, don’t you think? pic.twitter.com/JSUuHNgHw6
